Do you understand me?
Oh, God. Bosco, speak.

they just kept looking at me and started bringing out their guns and grenades.

As one tried to hit me in the chest, I countered the attack.

Before I realized it, the 50 men were on the floor.
I didn't even have a scratch. Boss, take a look.
-Bosco. -That's me.
The person who talks too much will definitely tell tall tales.
Don't be upset, boss.
Hey!
-Odogwu Malay! -My people, I salute.

translation.ja: サラミさん おはよう ついにお会いできた

translation.en: The pleasure is all mine.
translation.ja: こちらこそ よろしく

translation.en: My daughter.
Kemi Salami. I'll be acting as her legal counsel.
translation.ja: ケミです 弁護人として来ました

translation.en: Congratulations on your new appointment.
translation.ja: ご着任おめでとうございます

translation.en: Although the man before you happens to be my very good friend.
translation.ja: 前任者は私の友人でした

translation.en: I'm sure you are going to do great in this new appointment of yours.
translation.ja: あなたも立派に 責務を果たされるわ

translation.en: Of course, Mrs. Salami. Thank you.
translation.ja: そうですね　ありがとう

translation.en: You're welcome.
Well, I would not like to insult you by beating around the bush. Do you mind if we go straight to the point?
translation.ja: さて 恐縮ですが 単刀直入に話しても？

translation.en: -Oh, please. -Great.
translation.ja: もちろん 良かった

translation.en: Well, first of all I must thank you for coming on such short notice.
translation.ja: 急なお知らせにも関わらず お越し頂き 感謝します

translation.en: Well, she didn't have a choice.
Your men barricaded our house like she was a criminal.
translation.ja: 母は 罪人のように扱われた

translation.en: Sorry to hear that.
I must speak to my people on better procedure next time.
translation.ja: 今後 失礼がないよう 注意します

translation.en: Mr. Gobir, you invited me, and here I am.
translation.ja: ゴビルさん あなたの招請で― 私はここに来た

translation.en: I have nothing to hide.
Well, we are working on a tip from a very reliable source,
translation.ja: 信頼できる情報筋からの 告発があった

translation.en: that you are involved in, uh...
translation.ja: 以下に関係していると…

translation.en: Yes. Money laundering, drug and weapon smuggling.
translation.ja: 資金洗浄 ドラッグと武器の密輸だ

translation.en: Surely, you did not bring my mother here on hearsay.
translation.ja: 噂話レベルでは 召喚しないはず

translation.en: And who is this "reliable source" feeding you these tips?
Ms. Salami, with all due respect, you know I cannot tell you that.
translation.ja: 申し訳ありませんが それはお答えできない

translation.en: Well, those tips are simply unfounded.
translation.ja: その話は事実無根です

translation.en: My mother is a very hardworking woman with multiple legitimate businesses to her name.
translation.ja: 母は複数の企業を 同法的に経営しています

translation.en: Does she look like someone that smuggles drugs or weapons?
translation.ja: 密輸に関わるように 見えますか？

translation.en: Thank you for bringing that up. That's actually why we invited you all here.
translation.ja: それが ここに お越し頂いた理由です

translation.en: You see, our investigation uncovered that you use these businesses to launder money.
translation.ja: 資金洗浄にその事業が 使われていることが発覚

translation.en: And we also uncovered that you have multiple high-end properties
translation.ja: また あなたは 複数の高級物件を所有

translation.en: under the name of... Kachi Nwachukwu,
translation.ja: 所有登録は カチ･ンワチャク名義

translation.en: who, until recently, was your domestic help.
translation.ja: 最近まであなたの 使用人だった人だ

translation.en: -[chuckles] -Ma'am, I'm not sure how well you pay,
translation.ja: 購入価格の見当は付かないが

translation.en: but with two high rises in Ikoyi and one in VI...
translation.ja: 一等地の超高層マンション ３軒だ…

translation.en: And then, you have to explain the source of all that money scattered in your bank accounts.
translation.ja: 複数口座に分けた 金の出どころも説明して

translation.en: I'm not sure that would be gotten from the sale of lace and bread?
translation.ja: レース地とパンの 売り上げかな？

translation.en: I beg your pardon?
No, I'm saying she doesn't pay enough tax for that to be so.
translation.ja: 母上の税金の話じゃない

translation.en: Wait, you have her account information?
translation.ja: 口座情報も入手してると？

translation.en: Surely that's gross infringement of privacy, at least.
translation.ja: プライバシーの侵害だわ

translation.en: Ms. Salami, I assure you we have legal jurisdiction.
translation.ja: お嬢さん 我々には司法権があります

translation.en: You are allowed to be in this meeting simply out of courtesy.
translation.ja: あなたの同席も 親切心からですよ

translation.en: Your mother here does not need a lawyer, neither does she need a mouthpiece.
translation.ja: 母上は 弁護士も必要ない 代弁者もね

translation.en: It's just a simple questioning. I mean, it's just a mere conversation.
translation.ja: これは尋問です 単なる会話ですが

translation.en: So, I'll suggest that you allow her to speak for herself.
translation.ja: 母上に直接 お話を伺えますか

translation.en: That's all right.
As she said, I have loads of businesses.
translation.ja: 娘が言ったとおり たくさんの事業をしている

translation.en: A few fabric shops,
bakeries where I make my sweet, beautiful Agege bread
translation.ja: 甘い アゲゲを作ってる ベーカリーや

translation.en: two water bottling companies, other--
translation.ja: 飲料水の会社を２つ そして…

translation.en: And if you gave us time, we would have brought
translation.ja: 時間があれば― 質問に対する 必要な情報を揃えて来たのに

translation.en: the necessary documents needed to answer your questions in this regard.
translation.ja: 質問に対する 必要な情報を揃えて来たのに

translation.en: As for the properties owned by Kachi, she's worked with my mother since I was, what-- six years old?
translation.ja: カチは 家で６歳の頃から 働いてもらってた

translation.en: -But we haven't seen her in... two years? -Yeah, two years.
translation.ja: でもここ最近会ってない ２年間くらいね

translation.en: Two years.
So unless you can tie us to these buildings,
translation.ja: 物件との関係を証明せず

translation.en: I find this course of questioning disrespectful and completely out of order.
translation.ja: 尋問するのは失礼だし 常軌を逸してるわ

translation.en: [in Pidgin] Guy, why did you get a car with a broken radio?
translation.ja: この車 ラジオが聴けないぞ

translation.en: Turn down the volume. Turn it down.
Call Tiger now.
-His phone is switched off. -Call him again. Call him again, fast.
translation.ja: 通じない もう１度電話しろ　早く

translation.en: -Mr. Gobir? -Yes.
You didn't have to walk me out, you know.
translation.ja: 送らなくてもいいのに

translation.en: It's my pleasure.
-Please. -Oh, thank you.
Needless to say, you must let us know before any international travel.
translation.ja: ところで 海外旅行の際は 必ずお知らせください

translation.en: [laughs] Like I said earlier, I have nothing to hide, so I'm not running.
translation.ja: お伝えしたように 隠し事はしません

translation.en: Thank you once again and have a lovely evening.
translation.ja: ありがとう よい夕べを

translation.en: [Tiger] Hello?
-Hmm. -Mom, are you okay?
King, Musa and Tango have got the package cornered.
translation.ja: キング ムサたちが 獲物を追い詰めた

translation.en: Should they take it out?
Stop.
[sighs] The ground is very, very hot.
translation.ja: 今 動くのは危険だ

translation.en: It's because of Gobir's interference.
translation.ja: ゴビルの邪魔が入った

translation.en: -Ade, Tiger. -Yes, ma.
Keep eyes on him for now.
Boys, stand down.
Yes, boss. Yeah. Okay.
-Kemi. -Mum.
Get a gift to Mr. Gobir to apologize for his inconvenience.
translation.ja: 不便をかけた おわびの品を ゴビルに送って

translation.en: How much of an inconvenience are we talking?
A very big inconvenience.
Yeah, it's me. I need you to handle something for me immediately.
translation.ja: 私よ 今すぐ お願いしたい事があるの

translation.en: [in Hausa] Lord have mercy!
Hello?
[distorted voice] I see you got our gift.
Who is this?
It's a hand of friendship from Alhaja Salami.
translation.ja: サラミからの友情の印だ

translation.en: What if I refuse the gift?
Trust me, sir.
You would rather be friends with the Alhaja than her enemy.
translation.ja: 彼女を敵に回すより 手を組む方がいい

translation.en: Is that a threat?
Ah, Mr. Gobir. When did $500,000 in cash become a threat?
translation.ja: ゴビル 50万ドルは 脅しになるのか？

translation.en: I'm going to die, aren't I?
Don't say that!
[in Hausa] Don't talk like this, Hauwa. That will never happen. God forbid.
translation.ja: 〈ハウア 死ぬなんて言うな そんな事は起きない〉

translation.en: Come. God forbid. Come. Come.
[news anchor] Good evening, I am Sade Bello.
translation.ja: シャーディー･ベロです

translation.en: -[sirens blaring] -KAVTV can now confirm
that political ally and socialite Alhaja Eniola Salami
translation.ja: 政府シンパであり慈善家の エニオラ･サラミが―

translation.en: has been arrested this evening by state officials
translation.ja: 今晩州警察により 逮捕された事を確認

translation.en: on suspicion of murder, money laundering,
translation.ja: 容疑は 殺人と資金洗浄

translation.en: diversion of state funds, bribing a state agent.
translation.ja: 公金流用 そして 公務員贈賄です 公金流用 そして 公務員贈賄です 〝エニオラ･サラミ逮捕〞

translation.en: It has been confirmed that she has been taken into custody
translation.ja: 〝エニオラ･サラミ逮捕〞 非公開の場所に 拘留されました

translation.en: to an undisclosed location.
translation.ja: 非公開の場所に 拘留されました

translation.en: I demand to be let in to see my mother.
translation.ja: 母との面会を要求します

translation.en: Madam, you cannot demand anything here.
translation.ja: ここでは要求は受けません

translation.en: I'm her lawyer.
Madam, you cannot see her now. She is going through booking and--
translation.ja: 今は無理です 現在調書を取られて…

translation.en: What? So, you intend to keep her here overnight?
translation.ja: 何？ 母を１晩拘留するの？

translation.en: -Madam. -[Gobir] Ms. Salami.
translation.ja: マダム サラミさん

translation.en: -Sir! -You see, there is no need
translation.ja: サー！ 騒ぎ立てる必要はない

translation.en: to get overexcited.
translation.ja: 騒ぎ立てる必要はない

translation.en: You will see your mum as soon as she is booked and processed.
translation.ja: 調書の処理終了後 母上に会える

translation.en: So you are keeping her here overnight?
Yes, hopefully. And every other night until trial.
translation.ja: ええ願わくばそれ以上 公判までね

translation.en: On what charges?
Okay. There you go.
[scoffs] You can't prove any of this.
[whispers] Can I have this, please?
Shit.
Ah, ah.
[in Yoruba] Eni, you will hurt me.
translation.ja: 〈エニオラ 私を傷つけるな〉

translation.en: Good girl.
Why would I be dealing with a bloody servant when he has a king?
translation.ja: 〈王様とつき合ってるのに 使用人なんか 論外よ〉

translation.en: Ah. [laughs]
-I salute you, boss. -Yes, yes?
-We have a small big problem. -What are you saying?
Alhaji, I'll be on my way.
Say what you have to say and stop bothering me. Can't you see I'm--
translation.ja: 〈さっさと問題を言え 邪魔するな〉

translation.en: Alaaru was arrested just before he boarded the plane.
How? But we have people in there.
translation.ja: なぜだ？ 味方を送り込んでたのに

translation.en: Someone snitched on him.
Have you reached out to our people in there to see if there is anything they can do?
translation.ja: 味方に連絡して 手は打てないのか

translation.en: It's too late. He has been detained.
-Has he mentioned my name? -Not yet, sir.
Hurry up!
Reach out to our people on the inside so they can handle the situation.
translation.ja: 〈内部の仲間に連絡し 対処してもらえ〉

translation.en: -Do you understand me? -Yes, sir.
You understand?
Go and do something about it!
But if we don't deliver the package tonight, sir,
translation.ja: 〈しかし 〉 〈今夜荷物を届けないと ロンドンの契約を失う〉

translation.en: we will lose our contact in London.
translation.ja: 〈今夜荷物を届けないと ロンドンの契約を失う〉

translation.en: Ah, that's a problem.
That's a problem.
Don't worry about that. I will take it for you.
translation.ja: 〈心配しないで 私が届ける〉

translation.en: I said I'll take it for you.
My love, let me do this for you. I can carry it for you. You can trust me.
translation.ja: 〈いとしい人 私にやらせて　運べるわ〉

translation.en: [Kemi] Mummy. Mummy.
I was told I could confer with my client.
translation.ja: 依頼人と話す許可がある

translation.en: Alone!
[guard] Ten minutes.
Mummy, are they treating you well?
translation.ja: ママ 待遇は大丈夫？

translation.en: Kemi, they are closing in on me. All of them.
translation.ja: ケミ みんなが私を狙ってる みんなだ

translation.en: [in Yoruba] They can smell blood.
They want to get me.
Mummy, don't talk like that.
You can't let them see you like this. Defeated.
translation.ja: 打ちのめされた姿を 絶対 見せちゃダメ

translation.en: You are King.
The King.
Get me out.
I will. I'll get you out.
Don't cry. Don't let them see you cry.
translation.ja: 泣かないで 涙を見せないで

translation.en: Hello, sir.
[man] Gobir, well done. The entire department is so proud of you.
translation.ja: ゴビル 手柄だ 本庁全員がお前を誇りに思う

translation.en: Thank you, sir.
Make sure that woman doesn't get bail, though.
Of course, sir. I'm on it, sir.
And also make sure your case is airtight
translation.ja: 本件は 抜かりなく

translation.en: because that woman is as slippery as an eel, and extremely dangerous.
translation.ja: あの女はずる賢くて 非常に危険だ

translation.en: Yes, sir. Sure.
Good. Uh, Gobir?
Yes, sir?
Can I ask you a personal question?
translation.ja: 個人的な質問をいいか？

translation.en: [in Hausa] Yes, go ahead, sir.
translation.ja: 〈どうぞ 聞いてください〉

translation.en: The money.
I mean, weren't you even tempted at all?
translation.ja: 手を付けようと 思わなかった？

translation.en: Of course I was, sir.
[in Hausa] But if I had taken it, I would have become one of them.
translation.ja: 〈でも手を付けると ヤツらと同じだ〉

translation.en: And that is something my conscience cannot live with.
translation.ja: 罪の意識に 耐えられそうもない

translation.en: I have even more respect for you now. Thank you very much, Gobir.
translation.ja: 君への敬意が一層強まったよ ありがとう

translation.en: -Bye. -Thank you, sir.
-[laughing] -[in Yoruba] Me? With which guy?
That guy that walks around running his mouth.
I was just staring at him, wondering if he was talking to me.
translation.ja: 〈私に話してるかと 思っただけ〉

translation.en: Lord have mercy.
Eni-Baby.
You intoxicate me like alcohol all the time.
translation.ja: 〈いつも酒みたいに ワシを酔わせる〉

translation.en: I wish I met you when I was young.
translation.ja: 若い頃に会いたかった

translation.en: -You would have recognized! -Alhaji, you still have it now.
translation.ja: 〈気付いたか〉 あなたはまだ若いわ

translation.en: That's not true. There's a huge difference.
translation.ja: 〈それはウソだ 違いは大きい〉

translation.en: You would have enjoyed me the way the white man enjoys cigars.
That would have been too much.
My good lover. My sweet lover. My darling lover.
translation.ja: 〈かわいい人 あなたはいとしい恋人よ〉

translation.en: Eni, Eni.
You make me happy all the time.
translation.ja: いつもワシを幸せにするが

translation.en: But I've asked you to marry me and you have refused.
translation.ja: 〈求婚しても ずっと 拒んでるな〉

translation.en: What is wrong? Marry me.
Eni, listen. Why do you keep punishing me like this all the time?
translation.ja: 〈エニオラ 聞いてくれ なぜ 拒むんだ〉

translation.en: I am asking you to marry me. What is wrong with you? Eni.
translation.ja: 〈結婚して欲しい なぜなんだ ？〉

translation.en: Don't you already have a wife? Yes or no?
So? What does that have to do with anything?
Look, I can marry up to four wives.
translation.ja: ワシは４人まで 妻にできる

translation.en: Oh, so you want to marry four wives?
-No. -That's what you're saying.
translation.ja: 違うよ そう言った

translation.en: Don't misunderstand me, young lady.
translation.ja: 〈いや 誤解しないでくれ〉

translation.en: Look, I want you. It's you I want.
translation.ja: お前が欲しいんだ お前だけが

translation.en: Eni. Eni.
Alhaji.
You know I would do anything for you in this life.
translation.ja: あなたのためなら 何でもする

translation.en: Any bloody thing, I would do it.
But me?
I will never be a second wife.
Eni, Eni!
What's wrong with this girl?
[clicks tongue] I don't know why she's not picking up her calls.
Must be the network. Would you like to try my number?
translation.ja: 回線じゃない？ 私ので試す？

translation.en: Yeah.
Code.
Tiger, please give me 15 minutes, I'll be right down.
Where have you been?
Why haven't you been picking up my calls? I've been trying to reach you all day.
translation.ja: なぜ電話に出ない １日中探してた

translation.en: Kitan, not now please. I'm exhausted.
translation.ja: キタン 今は疲れてるの

translation.en: I've been at the holding cell all day trying to make bail.
translation.ja: 保釈にしたいの 電話も切ってた

translation.en: [Kitan] When is she coming out?
I'm doing everything I can, but they're intent on keeping her. I mean they don't even want to discuss bail
translation.ja: 全力を尽くしてるけど 保釈の話さえしたがらない

translation.en: and all our political contacts are distancing...
translation.ja: 政界からも 距離を置かれてる

translation.en: Hello. You must be so tired. Is there anything I can do to help?
translation.ja: こんにちは　お疲れね 何かお手伝いできる？

translation.en: [Kitan] This is my girlfriend, Amaka.
translation.ja: 俺の彼女 アマカだ

translation.en: Amaka, Kemi. My...
The one I told you about.
Oh, hi!
Amaka is a lawyer as well.
So, I have been trying to get her up to speed on everything that's going on.
translation.ja: 彼女にも手伝ってもらおう

translation.en: So, what I want you guys to do is sit down and strategize, so we can try to come up with a solution to this whole thing.
translation.ja: 一緒に座って 対策を 立てようじゃないか

translation.en: All right?
[Kemi] So what you are telling me is that...
translation.ja: あなたは こう言ってる…

translation.en: Wait, Kitan.
So, you discussed private family business with an outsider, huh?
translation.ja: 家族の問題を 外部に話したって事ね？

translation.en: Kitan...
if you think for a second that I'm going to sit down and talk strategy
translation.ja: 一瞬でもこう思ったのね 私がアナタのセフレと一緒に 対策を講じると

translation.en: with one of your whores--
translation.ja: 私がアナタのセフレと一緒に 対策を講じると

translation.en: Hey, there's no need for all that.
You're even more clueless than I've given you credit for.
translation.ja: 私が思ってたより ずっと愚かね

translation.en: [Amaka] My darling...
You know what, I think I should go.
No. This is my mother's house.
translation.ja: いや ここは母の家だ

translation.en: If anyone is going to leave, she is welcome to.
What's all this attitude? Is it not you I'm talking to?
-Kemi. -Kitan, babe. Babe, calm down.
translation.ja: ケミ キタン 落ち着いて

translation.en: -This is the rubbish I have to deal. -[Amaka] I know.
translation.ja: いつも ああだ いいの

translation.en: -[in Yoruba] Good afternoon. -Welcome.
-Is this Kemi? -Yes, it's her.
She's all grown up.
Kem-Kem.
Bunmi... Bunmi.
-Bunmi. -[in Yoruba] Oh, Eni-Baby. You came.
translation.ja: ブーミ 〈エニオラ… 来てくれたの〉

translation.en: Of course.
I dashed here as soon as I heard.
It's been a long time.
[Bunmi] You look so good.
I'm so glad you got out of that place early.
translation.ja: あんたは早く 抜け出せて良かった

translation.en: I can see that life has been kinder to you.
translation.ja: きっと いい生活が できてたんだね

translation.en: -Look at my Eni-Baby. -How are you?
translation.ja: エニ･ベイビーだ 調子は？

translation.en: How are you doing?
Sometimes bad,
sometimes worse.
translation.ja: もっとひどい時もある

translation.en: Today is bad. So I thank God.
translation.ja: 今日はひどい だから神に感謝だわ

translation.en: Look. See, I am going to take you to a hospital that is very, very good.
translation.ja: ねえ 私がいい病院に 連れて行ってあげる

translation.en: [in Yoruba] A hospital where they know what they're doing.
Do you understand? Don't worry.
translation.ja: 分かる？ 心配しないで

translation.en: I just need one favor from you.
Name anything.
No. No.
Look, you're going to get better and take care of your child by yourself.
translation.ja: ねえ 回復して あなたが育てるの

translation.en: [in Yoruba] You hear me? By the grace of God,
translation.ja: 〈聞こえた？〉 神のお恵みで 回復し 子どもの面倒を見るの

translation.en: you will get better and you will take care of her by yourself.
translation.ja: 神のお恵みで 回復し 子どもの面倒を見るの

translation.en: That's exactly what will happen.
No, I will not.
It's already too late. There is no cure for this thing.
translation.ja: 手遅れよ　治療法がない

translation.en: Don't talk like that.
[in Yoruba] What do these people know?
They don't know anything. What do they know?
All they are looking for is money. Let me tell you something.
translation.ja: 欲しいのはお金だけ いい？

translation.en: Chief knows every doctor. There is no doctor...
translation.ja: 長官が いい医者を知ってるわ

translation.en: [in Yoruba] Look, we will fly them in.
We will fly them in. Do you understand?
translation.ja: 飛行機で来させるから

translation.en: I just want you to take care of Kemi for me.
translation.ja: あなたに ケミの面倒を見て欲しい

translation.en: There is no other person on this earth I can trust more.
translation.ja: あなたほど 信頼できる人はいない

translation.en: I don't want her to grow up in my environment.
translation.ja: この環境で育って欲しくない

translation.en: That dirty world we grew up in.
translation.ja: 私が育ったのは 汚れた世界

translation.en: Please help me give her a better life.
translation.ja: 娘に いい世界を 見せてあげて欲しい

translation.en: A life I can never give her, but you now can.
translation.ja: 私は見せられないけど 今のあなたならできる

translation.en: I promise.
